name: Drink Until You Pass Out
description:
**The HTML game has glitchy graphics! DOWNLOAD THE WINDOWS VERSION TO PLAY PROPERLY!!!**

Use the arrow keys to move around.
The goal of the game is to drink all the beer, but with each beer you drink, Santa sways more and more.
You'll have to use his sways to your advantage to finish the game.



For those who don't manage to finish the game on PC, check out this video that shows the full game, along with it's ending scene!
